description:
Creality Print is a self-developed Fused deposition modeling slicing software produced by Creality.

It's a practical and easy-to-use tool that can help you remote control and monitor your 3D printer and help print directly from your computer.
Fixed
Hardware and Calibration Issues
- Incorrect default values for [PA Calibration]
- The target chamber temperature always shows 0 and needs to be fixed.
Machine Printing and Parameter Issues
- For the 3V3PLUS machine with IP 172.23.215.254, when sliced by a K2 machine and sent to the machine for printing via the local network, the machine always starts printing; also, the parameter update fails when clicking "Update Parameters" in the parameter set.
Gcode-related Issues
- Network send gcode causing the printer to report error 2060 and abnormal image previews.
UI Display and Software Adaptation Issues
- [Mac] Software adaptation issue on high - resolution laptops, as shown in the figure.
- When printing too many models on one plate, the object exclusion window on the device details page displays abnormally and cannot show all the content.
